description.narrative: Global Climate Change Alliance Belize: Enhancing Belize’s capacity to adapt to Climate Change

document-link.url: https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/BLZ/02-GCCA UNDP CA Annex I - Description of the Action.doc

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Extent to which climate finance is being accessed (by government and non-government institutions)
Extent to which there is a strengthened system in place to access, deliver, monitor, report on and verify climate finance
Extent to which implementation of comprehensive measures - plans, strategies, policies, programmes and budgets - to achieve low-emission and climate-resilient development objectives has improved.

The proposed initiative targets directly climate change governance structures, positioning the Government of Belize to effectively plan for and manage the effects of climate change on Belize’s Development.

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Extent to which climate finance is being accessed (by government and non-government institutions)
Extent to which there is a strengthened system in place to access, deliver, monitor, report on and verify climate finance
Extent to which implementation of comprehensive measures - plans, strategies, policies, programmes and budgets - to achieve low-emission and climate-resilient development objectives has improved.

The objective of this project is to enable Belize to prepare its Fourth National Communication (FNC) under decision 17/CP7 and the First Biennial Update Report (BUR) under decision 2/CP17 of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.
